WornOutShield.name: Worn-out Shield
WornOutShield.desc: A worn out shield that can be equipped to raise def stat by 5.

WoodenShield.name: Wooden Shield
WoodenShield.desc: An old shield made out of wood that can be equipped to raise def stat by 8.

SteelShield.name: Steel Shield
SteelShield.desc: A steel shield used for defense that can be equipped to raise def stat by 15.

Revitalizer.name: Revitalizer
Revitalizer.desc: This item grants people to be able to heal each turn while equipped.

RedShirt.name: Red Shirt
RedShirt.desc: Wearer's purpose is to show that the enemy is indeed dangerous without losing anyone important

ScorchChestplate.name: Scorch Chestplate
ScorchChestplate.desc: An fascinatingly crafted chestplate made from raw material from Grifflates, signature for a core on its center.

TearCloak.name: TearCloak
TearCloak.desc: A cloak made from what seem to be tears of a Flow Sprout. Ideal for going with the flow, in a literal sense.

ScorchChestplace.name: ScorchChestplace
ScorchChestplace.desc: A fascinatingly crafted chestplate made from raw material from Grifflates, signature for a core on its center. With it you can damage physical attacks on the attacker at no cost.
